Creates new form SearchSortFrame
set(int, SortableBar) - Method in class searchsort.BarArray
replaces the SortableBar in position Index with value, losing whatever content was previously there.
setAutoReset(boolean) - Static method in class searchsort.AbstractSearchSortThread
indicates whether this thread should reset the setCount, putCount, compareCount and timer when it is run.
setBarWidth(double) - Static method in class searchsort.SortableBar
 
setCount() - Static method in class searchsort.BarArray
returns the number of times that "set()" has been called.
setCurrentComparisonType(int) - Static method in class searchsort.SortableBar

setNewBarArray(BarArray) - Method in class searchsort.DisplayThread
 
sharedActionIndicatorQueue() - Static method in class searchsort.ActionIndicatorQueue
gets the singleton incidence of the ActionIndicatorQueue - the only one you'll ever need!
size() - Method in class searchsort.BarArray
accessor for the length of the array.
SortableBar - Class in searchsort
this class is the core data element in the SearchSort program.
SortableBar() - Constructor for class searchsort.SortableBar
by default, creates a bar with random values.
SortableBar(String) - Constructor for class searchsort.SortableBar
accepts a tokenized string of four doubles (separated by the "\" token) to create this SortableBar.
SortableBar(SortableBar) - Constructor for class searchsort.SortableBar
creates a new SortableBar that is a copy of the source.
SortableBar(double, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class searchsort.SortableBar
creates a specific SortableBar, based on the included information, all of which must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
startThreads() - Method in class searchsort.SearchSortFrame
 
StatsThread - Class in searchsort
A Thread subclass that keeps track of the number of "sets," "puts" and "compares," as well as the time, and updates the screen with them.
StatsThread(JLabel, JLabel, JLabel, JLabel) - Constructor for class searchsort.StatsThread

STATUS_STRINGS - Static variable in interface searchsort.Constants
 
STATUS_UNSORTED - Static variable in interface searchsort.Constants
 
stepProcess() - Method in class searchsort.AbstractSearchSortThread
resets the variables to allow the algorithm to continue, at least until the next execution check-in
stopCheckingStats() - Method in class searchsort.StatsThread
Sets the updating of the stats labels on the screen to only once every 1/4 sec and stops the timer.
subarray(int, int) - Method in class searchsort.BarArray
creates a new BarArray that contains the same items as the specified range in this BarArray.

creates a new BarArray that contains the same items as the specified range in this BarArray.

switches the items at locations i and j in the list.
